item.title: Github Actions: setting up Docker on macOS
item.description: Gnomock had a very extensive test suite since the very beginning. The tests ran on Github Actions and CircleCI platforms, on Linux, to make sure that both CI/CD platforms are properly supported. After all, Gnomock is used during CI, and not only locally.
